body:
Hi guys, I am Spritmage123, and I have been here since MCZone. I have quite a confession to make and I am hopefully coming to return; hoping I am forgiven after my "angry exit"
When I joined MCZone, I said I was 16. Many people believed it; and I said I had a young voice..I am not 16... I'm actually turning 13 on 23rd of April...
I am hoping I can come back here; and no one thinks me different.
body_tagged:

I am hoping I can come back here; and no one thinks me different.
title: Hello again! Apologies and a confession.

replies.body: I kinda always knew you aren't 16 :O. Anyways I don't really care, you are still a very mature intelligent person <3
replies.body_tagged: I kinda always knew you aren't 16 :O. Anyways I don't really care, you are still a very mature intelligent person <3

replies.body:
Nobody really cares about the age, the important thing here is that you are a nice person and you will always be :) 
If you are five or twenty-two, I do not care, you are very mature and we don't care about how old are you, we care about how you act :) 
<3 <3 <3
replies.body_tagged:

<3 <3 <3

replies.body: Always keep your age a secret from strangers.
replies.body_tagged: Always keep your age a secret from strangers.

replies.body: Thanks guys... And about the server I was moderating on... Well, someone got onto my account, griefed it... annnnnndd I got demoted ._. - IM hoping to apply here.
